game_description: Experience the game called one of the most terrifying experiences in VR. What an excellent day for an exorcism! Free cross-buy enabled- Play on a VR ready PC with deluxe graphics. Described as one of the most disturbing experiences available for virtual reality, The Exorcist: Legion features FIVE connected stories and features a variety of demonic entities, exorcism tools, hidden artifacts and atmospheric locations. Delve deep into the heart of the supernatural as you learn the trade of demonic exorcism and uncover secrets leading you towards a final confrontation with your darkest, most hidden fears. Are you brave enough? The Exorcist: Legion is part action, part mystery, part puzzle-solving... and ALL terror. -------------------------------------------------- The Exorcist III and all related characters and elements are trademarks of and © Morgan Creek Film Partners I, and LegionVR, LLC, a Fun Train company. review_1: The game it self should be a 10-10 my. Favourite part about it was when you would get to kill the demon and I love how some of them have a story to them my Favourite￼ chapter was probably chapter 3 with the baby where the wife was a Fashion model or whatever and she became pregnant and now thinks she is ugly?￼
review_2: If you love horror, this game is amazing. More of an experience than a typical game. It's terrifying. But if you push through it, the rush is so good. I loved how all the chapters are so different with a new environment and story. This is like a fantastic Halloween event that I can do multiple times a year just to get in a horror mood and admire the grisly images. The graphics are great -- realistic and terrifying. I cannot wait for the sequel! I hope it's as good as this one.
review_3: I couldn't really get into the game as much as I really wanted to. I tried several times. The problem is I am not able to sit and play and I end up being like 3 feet tall. I kept hoping for some kind of patch for making able to sit instead of having to stand.
